nodes.long_description:
**Become part of an elite special forces unit in Tactical Assault VR!**

• Habie147 - ‘Tactical Assault Is One Of The Best Hardcore Shooters I’ve Played’

• Gamertag VR - ‘The Best Tactical VR FPS On Quest’

• Controlled Pairs - ‘The Best CQB Game I've Ever Played’

Tactical Assault VR is an intense tactical shooter where you use real-world CQB (Close Quarters Battles) tactics to stack up, breach doors and eliminate threats. Play solo or join an online co-op special forces unit in missions around the world.

# Features
**PvE Missions: Solo or Online Multiplayer Co-Op with Up to 6 Players**
{1487526115258066}

**PvP: Competitive Online Multiplayer**
{1082589306850803}

**7 Non-Linear, Asymmetrical Missions & 2 Wave Shooter Experiences**

Plan your assault. The choice is yours.
{448475627682065}

**Hostile Surrendering**

{999770658801096}

**Game Mode Variety**

Bomb Defusal, Hostage Rescue, High-Value Target (HVT) Eliminations, Mini Games, Room Randomizer Killhouse
{1946208202559962}

**40+ Detailed Weapons and Counting**

Customize your loadout with tactical gear including vests, helmets, weapons, scopes, sights, grips and breaching equipment.
{1007758587705278}
nodes.short_description: Tactical Assault VR is an intense tactical shooter where you use real-world CQB (Close Quarters Battles) tactics to stack up, breach doors and eliminate threats. Play solo or join an online co-op special forces unit in missions around the world.

nodes.long_description:
Become part of an elite special forces unit and use real-world CQB (Close Quarters Battles) tactics to clear rooms, breach doors, and defeat the enemy threat.

FEATURES:

• Utilize an arsenal of weapons, scopes, sight attachments, explosives and equipment.

• Take note of simulated wind and target distance with the wind meter and spotter scope. Calculate physics-based bullet drop and time-to-hit to improve your accuracy.

• Use stealth to sneak up behind enemies with a silent knife kill. Or go head-to-head against enemies that will take cover and attempt to flank your position.

• Randomized Enemy positions and doors, making each play-through an unknown challenge.

• Non-linear maps give players an endless variety in how they choose to infiltrate and complete missions. Enter buildings through doors, climb ladders to reach rooftops, or climb through windows. The choice is yours.

Tactical Assault VR is currently an Early Access release and is updated regularly.
nodes.short_description: Tactical MilSim CQB (Close Quarters Battles) in Virtual Reality

nodes.change_log:
Tactical Assault VR v0.9.14
• Fixed Snake Cam levitating players
• Added Sandbox Modifier for missions (Objectives only, no enemies outside of HVTs).
SANDBOX MULTIPLAYER is only available in PRIVATE ROOMS. The modifier is not available for public rooms.
EnemyAi will not target Spawn Zone 2 players in Sandbox Modes (HVTs exist in Mission Sandbox for mission completion). Objectives cannot be completed for players in Spawn Zone 2. Unlimited respawns in Mission Sandbox Mode.
• Updated PvP Avatars to use baked (non-customizable) character presets. Saves on performance. Defensive Team uses Enemy Avatars.
• Removed sandbox borders
• Updated weapon fire smoke
• Fixed other players grabbing primary weapon with Autosling OFF
• Various optimizations
• Network optimizations (by Kenamis)

Puddle's Weapon Updates:
• Increased damage on M40 and CSR sniper rifles
• Reduced damage and increased recoil on AS Val smg
• Updated AS Val smg model
• Updated Uzi smg gunshot audio
• Reduced HK45T pistol recoil
• Improved scope clarity for SVD and ACOG sights
• Updated sight angles to match M4A1 100m zero
• Increased view distance on most magnified scopes
• Updated DR 1-4x and ACOG 4x scope reticles to match the ballistics of M4A1 rifle
• Updated 12x sight reticle, calibrated to mills. Grab and press A/B to increase/decrease elevation angle, hold for faster adjust
• Updated SVD sniper rifle scope and reticle. Grab and press A/B to adjust aiming range from 100m to 500m
• Added VSS Classic sniper rifle, grab sight and press A/B to adjust range from 50m to 400m
• Added R93T .338 sniper rifle
• Added bolt release button to M4 Entry and SPAS12 shotguns
• Added loadout Randomize and Feeling Lucky buttons
• Fixed Impact Grenade utility safety delay not working
• Fixed broken display names for Uzi and AS Val smgs in main menu loadout screen
• Fixed broken 12x scope model
• Fixed LPVO reticle zoom not matching camera zoom
• Small bug fixes

----------------------------

Tactical Assault VR v0.9.131 Various Fixes
• Fixed UZI and VAL mags showing floating bullets in LCK cameras when pouched
• Fixed Door Knocker and Sledgehammer giving flying abilities
• Removed Leg stabbing from all enemies to free up resources (Stabbing available on enemy Torso and Head)
• Fixed broken Trip Wires
• Fixed M40 and CSR sniper rifles breaking "Hold Breathe" mechanic when grabbing the shoulder stock or foregrip
• LMGs stock grabbing no longer has influence on the primary grab
• Changed: Public PvP Rooms now have a Team-Kill limit of 10 until a player is automatically kicked. No more unlimited TKs in a PUBLIC PvP room

Tactical Assault VR v0.9.13
• Added Female Rolled Sleeve Tucked Boots option (by Canto)
• Added PvP Killfeed toggle to settings. Turn off the killfeed in Settings > Multiplayer
• Added "Long Range Guards" enemies to Sandbox. Practice long range shooting in Sandbox
• Updated Sandbox terrain
• Refinements to Bipod stability
• Added Hold Breathe stabilization mechanic to Sniper Rifles (Mount the bipod and Press and HOLD Primary button to hold your breathe and stabilize your aim for 4 seconds. Timed-out for another 4 seconds. Timed-out if Primary button is released, weapon is fired, grab is released or bipod is closed/unmounted)
• Optimizations for Enemy Ai
• Fixed broken Force Grabbing on respawn
• Removed force grabbing for non-owners of loadout items. If you did not spawn in the object, you cannot force grab the object
• Fixed Grenade pin grabbing on shared grenades
• Spent 40mm Grenades will now destroy themselves immediately after being released from the GLtube
• Fixed pouched Chemlights being grabbable on other player avatars
• Fixed missing Female HRT Masked option
• Fixed Female HRT Masked color selection
• Fixed Trident Lightning broken enemy spawn trigger preventing Terrorist Hunt completion
• (PCVR) Fixed custom Voice Over audio clips not working if there is only 1 audio clip in the folder

by Puddle_NL:
• Added Uzi Classic SMG
• Added AS Val SMG
• Fixed AUG A3 spawning with one different magazine
• Updated FAL Para, FAL Classic, UMP45, AKM Classic and AMD65 bullet velocities
• Fixed magazine fed open bolt weapons not charging on spawn
• Small bug fixes


-------------------------------------------------

Tactical Assault VR v0.9.12:
• Fixed enemy spawn triggers
• Fixed hostages being triggered from too far of a distance
• Fixed Grenade launchers incorrectly ordered in the main menu loadout
• Various optimizations
• Fixed audio files using too much memory due to being loaded, even if not in use
• Fixed 40mm Grenade shells not getting destroyed after being fired, creating an abundance of grenade objects active in the scene

Tactical Assault VR v0.9.111:
• Fixed 40mm Grenades not being destroyed properly
• Updated Bullet logic
• Fixed missing muzzle flashes
• Added Weapon Calibration to Grenade Launchers
• Refinements to weapon calibration logic
• Fixed Room Randomizer exit button not working for clients
• Various performance optimizations

Puddle Updates:
• Fixed flying pistol magazine glitch
• Removed double action on p320

-------------------------------------------------

Tactical Assault VR v0.9.11 Changelog

*NOTE: Full Body Avatars are disabled by default. Enable full body avatar in the Settings Menu*

• Added "Render Full Body Avatar" toggle in Settings Menu. OFF (no body)  by default.
• Added Clipped Wings to PvP
• Improved Bullet Hit sync between all players (ex. synchronized Target Range hit detection)
• Improved enemy animations sync for clients

Puddle Updates:
• updated M45A1 with 10rd magazine
• fixed disproportionate bullet hit detection
• reduced M40 and CSR damage
• updated G36C model
• added G36K rifle
• added G36V Classic rifle
• added P320 pistol
• fixed weapon models in main menu loadout preview
• added M320 and M320 GLS shoulder utilities
• added Frag, Flash and Smoke round utility items for M320
• fixed MP5/10 and UMP45 not chambering in specific cases
• fixed AUG firing when out of battery or jammed
• added DR 1-4x sight
• reduced breaching charge size, fixed pin interaction issue
• set default name for Steam users with no nickname
• fixed ammo boxes and wave drops not spawning SMG magazines
• added toast queuing for game tips messages

-------------------------------------------------

Tactical Assault VR v0.9.1 Changelog

Base Game Additions:
• Added ORION Mission to base game (FREE)
• Added Snow Camos to Avatar Customization (FREE)
• Chemlights (4 default chemlights available on a newly added pouch located on your left hip. Default chemlights do not get destroyed on down/death but will drop at your location and must be recovered. Chemlights are also selectable as utilities. Carry up to 8 chemlights total)
• Added LEARN video tutorials produced by LinearCircle
• Added Enemy cameras to LCK (only useable in Room Randomizer and Sandbox)
• Added PvP Team scoring and winner declaration at the end of each PvP round. A match winner is declared at the end of the third round. PvP winners are determined by the current team's accumulated kill score. Players who leave early and have kills are subtracted from the kill total.
• Added Smooth Hand Tracking filter in Controller Prefs (experimental)
• Added Flattened Veil to PvP (FREE)
• Added ORION to PvP (FREE)
• Added HRT Mask (by Canto)
• Added FM54 Gas mask (by Canto)
• Added Slick Plate Carrier (by Canto)
• Added MICH Helmet High Accessories (by Canto)
• Added CantoCarrier plate carrier (by some guy Canto)
• Added CantoPanel back panel (by ... Canto.)
• Added RPK (by Puddle_NL)
• Added RPK74 (by Puddle_NL)
• Added AUG LMG (by Puddle_NL)
• Added MP5k (by Puddle_NL)

Operation: Dahlia Additions:
• Added Clipped Wings (Barrio) mission
• Updated OD lobby to include randomized killhouse and range targets with host control
• (Operation: Dahlia) Added Surveillence Cameras to Collapsing Star (used with LCK recordings)
• Added FBI Casual (by Canto)
• Added FBI Plain Hat (by Canto)
• Added TX10 Taser (by Puddle_NL)
FBI Special Agent Pack (Separate DLC):
• HRT (Hostage Rescue Team) FBI-labeled Outfit
• Bump Helmet Variations (by Canto)
• FBI Special Agent Jacket Outfit
• HRT Plate Carrier (by Canto)
• FBI-labeled Headwear variations (by Canto)
• FBI-labeled Slick Plate Carrier (by Canto)
• FBI Hips accessories-only (by Canto)
• CSR Bolt-Action Sniper Rifle (308) (by Puddle_NL)
• 11.5 HRT Rifle (5.56) (by Puddle_NL)
• MP5/10 SNG (10mm 2-round burst) (by Puddle_NL)
• G23 Pistol (40cal) (by Puddle_NL)

Updates:
• Updated graphical fidelity of Trident Lightning (Remaster) *with a new skybox by Fromk*
• Updated graphical fidelity of Room Randomizer (updated walls to black textile)
• Updated Room Randomizer with "How-To-CQB" art (by Jorin)
• Updated Main Menu UI
• Updated Multiplayer Lobby mission selection UI with map types separated by category buttons (Missions, Training, Shootout)
• Optimizations to Hammer Fire mission
• Optimizations for Hidden Forest + more trees
• Updated Breaking Whisper with more trees and foliage
• Individual laser colors between players
• Moved Spotter Scope to Shoulder Utilities
• Persistent Dead bodies in single player and PCVR multiplayer lobbies. Not available in crossplay due to performance
• Decreased enemy accuracy for more randomized bullet groupings. Accuracy exponentially decreases with distance. Prone enemies are still have increased accuracy
• Improved enemy bullet-hit react animations. No longer performing The Matrix Agent bullet dodges
• Updated Easier Lockpicking

Fixes:
• Various minor fixes and polish throughout
• Fixed Liv memory leak with Enemy cameras when exiting a mission
• Fixed over-twisting ragdolls for host in multiplayer
• Fixed inconsistent footsteps sounds

Puddle_NL Updates:

Additions:
• Added PiP NVG option
• Added nvg brightness adjust
• Added monocular nvg option (L/R, PiP only)
• Added magazine ammo check haptics. Press a/x while holding a magazine and 0-4 pulses will indicate the remaining ammo percentage in the magazine.
• Added multiplayer lobby filters
• Added manual bolt/slide lock (if available). Pull back and release while holding the a/x button on your controller grabbing the bolt/slide
• Added breech loading for tube fed shotguns
• Added 4 different knive options randomly selected at spawn
• Added weapon malfunctions (dounle feed, stovepipe, failure to cycle)
• Added button bolt release to mp7, mp9, type 20 and g36c
• Added magwell grip to more weapons
• Added RPK, RPK74, AUG LMG and MK5K to base game
• Added taser handgun to Swat DLC. Tased ai enemies (not HVTs) have a base 50% chance to get knocked out, chance increases by missing enemy health percentage
• Added MP5/10, G23, 11.5 HRT and CSR to FBI DLC
• Added M16A2 Classic 4x Acog sight
• Added OEM iron sights to L85

Updates:
• Updated AUG, P90, SPAS12, MP7, SCAR-H, M40, SVD, Minimi, FN MAG, PKM, FAMAS, L85, HK45, 12X, Laser and Flashlights models
• Updated white NVG color
• Updated NVG controls
• Nvg color setting is now persistent
• Prevent players from rejoining lobbies they were kicked from
• Updated AKTK ban system
• Updated p226 to use m9 magazines
• Updated famas and aug to use ar magazines (updated famas from f1 to g2)
• Updated cartridge brass colors, fired brass is now a slightly darker color for easier identification
• Pistol red dot reticle selection made persistent
• Empty lmg belt boxes can be removed without opening the lmg top cover
• Spas12 made semi auto
• Adjusted enemy ai morale values for more consistency in surrendering
• Magwell grip disabled on certain guns when no magazine is loaded
• Charged weapons will dry fire only once
• Increased pistol only loadout from 6 to 8 chest magazines
• Removed bolt slap on mp7 and mp9
• HK bolts no longer automatically lock back
• Increased Vepr12 loadout from 4 to 6 chest magazines
• Rebalanced bullet damage by caliber
• Updated bullet models
• Updated bullet tracers for lmgs
• Updated bullet velocities based on caliber and barrel length (half of real velocity)
• Tracers now fire intermittent (every 3-4 rounds)
• Tracers are provided by the lmg magazines and can be loaded into other compatible rifles to fire tracers
• Reduced fov and increased range on primary weapon light
• Updated and rebalanced pistol recoil
- Rattler and LVAW moved to SMG category
• Virtus damage and recoil increased
• Updated reticle brightness for sights
• Prevent weapons from firing out of battery
• Disabled hand grabber being usable for anything other than a magazine when holding another magazine in your palm
• Increased 7.62 ak recoil
• Reduced m110 damage
• Removed G18C suppressors and optics
• Updated most weapon names in loadout menus

Fixes:
• Fixed M40 charging handle, can only be fired with charging handle closed and released
• Fixed 7.62 and 5.45 bullets not fitting in the magazines
• Fixed laser dot being stuck at last distance when pointing at the sky
• Fixed magazine bullets being removed out of order when depleting
• Fixed flashlight on pump shotguns now moving with the pump handle
• Fixed misaligned light and laser beams
• Fixed mp5 fire selector animation
• Fixed FAL mag in dump pouch glitch

• Fixed broken display names for Uzi and AS Val smgs in main menu loadout screen
• Fixed broken 12x scope model
• Fixed LPVO reticle zoom not matching camera zoom
• Small bug fixes
